Title: Books are a window on knowledge - Young friends, enthusiastically love books
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Learning, scholarship and books are rehabilitated. The book titles cannot be discerned, but they clearly are educational, not about politics and revolution. The printed word is no longer seen as potentially suspect, fraught with political heresy, but as a true window on knowledge.
Theme: To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
